content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Crude Oil Extraction Structure at position(17.5, 40.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Pumpjack (position x=17.5, y=40.5)
- Pumpjack (position x=20.5, y=40.5)
- PipeGroup (position x=19.5 y=38.5) that connects the pumpjacks

#### Boiler at position(14.5, 41.0)
Consists of a single Boiler entity (position x=14.5, y=41.0)

### ERROR TIPS

* Errors when placing entities too close to other entities or on unplaceable terrain (water):
  - Ensure there is enough space between entities and that the target location is not occupied or unplaceable.
* Errors when placing entities too far away:
  - Move closer to the target position before attempting to place an entity.
* Errors when attempting to place entities next to other entities with insufficient spacing or incorrect direction:
  - Adjust the spacing or direction when placing entities next to other entities.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
